how-it-works-section.title: How it works
how-it-works-section.description: Help make your community better by reporting issues that need attention. Together we can create a safer and more pleasant environment for everyone.

step1.title: Report an Issue
step1.description: Spot a problem? Report it in seconds. Your quick action keeps the community safe.

step2.title: Track Progress
step2.description: Watch as your report turns into action. You'll receive an update once the issue is resolved.

step3.title: See Results
step3.description: Problem solved! Your report made the neighborhood better for everyone.

processFlow.title: Community Impact
processFlow.description: With FIX, anyone can quickly report local infrastructure issues, ensuring the right authorities take action-whether it's a blocked pathway, a safety hazard, or a lost item. By bridging the gap between the public and local services, FIX helps keep Swiss communities cleaner, safer, and better connected.

AboutUsSection.title: About us
AboutUsSection.description: FIX began with a simple question: Who takes care of abandoned bikes?
AboutUsSection.description2: It all began with a lone bicycle in Zug. Day after day, it sat under a tree, enduring sun, rain, and snow. Four weeks went by unnoticed - until one day it simply vanished.
AboutUsSection.outro: Was it stolen? Did the owner search for it? Did the police even know it was there?

items.question: How do I report an incident?
items.answer: You can easily report an incident through our web application. Simply describe the issue, add a location, and optionally upload a photo.

items.question: How long does it take to process?
items.answer: Reports are typically processed within 24-48 hours. Urgent matters may be handled more quickly depending on their severity.

items.question: Is the service available in my area?
items.answer: Our service is currently available in Switzerland.

items.question: Will I receive a confirmation?
items.answer: Yes, you will receive a confirmation email once your report has been submitted successfully.

items.question: Can I view my incident report later?
items.answer: Yes, you can access your submitted reports through the link in the confirmation email.

items.question: I can't find a suitable category, what should I do?
items.answer: If you can't find an exact match, choose the category that best fits your situation. You can provide more details in the description field.

items.question: Do I need to fill in all fields?
items.answer: Only the incident type, location, and your data are required. Photos and description are optional but helpful for better understanding of the situation.

items.question: Can I edit my report after submission?
items.answer: Once submitted, reports cannot be edited. If you need to make changes, please contact our support team.
